concept_welcome_explain: an evaluation platform for news recommender systems
concept_discover_explain: explore news according to your interest center
settings_title: Preserve your confidence and your privacy
settings_title_explain: To ensure greater transparency about the data that Renewal collects about you, how it is used and the means at your disposal to control your personal data.
settings_section_sensors_explain: Some articles are based on the fine analysis of your behavior within the application and requires access to different sensors.
settings_section_recommendations_explain: Some articles are based on what you do elsewhere.But you will still see articles about your use within the app.
settings_section_recommendations_activit: Some article recommendations are based on online activity on social networks.
settings_section_recommendations_access_: Retention of information or access to information already stored on your device, such as device identifiers.
settings_section_recommendations_target_: The collection of information associated with those collected previously to select and distribute content to you, then evaluate their dissemination and effectiveness.
settings_popup_location_explain: To view local news articles, allow access to Renewal from your device settings
settings_popup_pedometer_explain: The pedometer allows you to analyze your behavior more precisely.You can configure in the settings
settings_popup_notification: Do you allow Renewal to send you notifications?
settings_popup_notification_explain: Notifications can include alerts, sounds, and pellets, you can configure in the settings
share_message_1: Hello, you might find the article
